Room.Name: Outside the east gate of Arkham
Room.Description: You are on the eastern outskirts of Arkham. A rough, barely used path heads east from the city while the black gates of Arkham open out westwards into it.

Room.Name: On a rough and narrow path
Room.Description: You are on what appears to be a newly made path heading east out of Arkham. The dirt is barely trodden down and there doesn't appear to be much traffic though here. The path continues east and west.

Room.Name: On a rough and narrow path
Room.Description: The path here is narrow and only just discernable. The few people who seem to have trodden it have passed through recently and there doesn't look like it is being prepared for any real use.

Room.Name: On a rough and narrow path
Room.Description: The path here is a little wet and damp underfoot. A rather strong and foul smell is wafting in from the east, something smelling strongly like swamp gas. The path continues north and gets even less clear to the east.

Room.Name: On a damp, poorly walked path
Room.Description: The pathway here is almost non-existent as the damp waters from the swampy land east of Arkham obliterate the recent footsteps. A foul smell is wafting in from the east where the Arkham swamps begin.

Room.Name: In a damp patch of ground
Room.Description: You are in a damp marshland region just east of Arkham. At your feet the soft ground gives way to a rising water table that has turned the fertile lands of Arkham's east into a useless swamp.

Room.Name: Shallow swamp lands
Room.Description: The swamp is only just encroaching on this part of the land. Water seeps into your clothing and the foul stench of swamp gasses cling to everything. To the east the swamp really begins.

Room.Name: In the Arkham swamps
Room.Description: You are in a knee deep swamp filled with foul looking plants of insects. Loud plopping and slurping sounds come from all around you as the local wildlife feed in the slop. A foul stench almost overwhelms you as swamp gas rises in thick wisps of smoke all around.

Room.Name: In the Arkham swamps
Room.Description: You are in a knee deep swamp filled with foul looking plants of insects. Loud plopping and slurping sounds come from all around you as the local wildlife feed in the slop. A foul stench almost overwhelms you as swamp gas rises in thick wisps of smoke all around.

Room.Name: On a murky trail through the swamp

Room.Description: You are in a knee deep swamp filled with foul looking plants of insects. Loud plopping and slurping sounds come from all around you as the local wildlife feed in the slop. A foul stench almost overwhelms you as swamp gas rises in thick wisps of smoke all around.

Room.Name: In the Arkham swamps
Room.Description: You are in a knee deep swamp filled with foul looking plants of insects. Loud plopping and slurping sounds come from all around you as the local wildlife feed in the slop. A foul stench almost overwhelms you as swamp gas rises in thick wisps of smoke all around.

Room.Name: Deep in the Arkham swamps
Room.Description: The swamp here is almost impassable. Large thick plants covered in wet vines and sharp thorns seem to grow everywhere, and it is only due to some recent clearing that you can move through it. The clearance of the swamp vegetation does not seem fully coordinated and wanders around a fair bit in what appears to be a hasty attempt to get somewhere.

Room.Name: Deep in the Arkham swamps
Room.Description: The swamp here is almost impassable. Large thick plants covered in wet vines and sharp thorns seem to grow everywhere, and it is only due to some recent clearing that you can move through it. The clearance of the swamp vegetation does not seem fully coordinated and wanders around a fair bit in what appears to be a hasty attempt to get somewhere.

Large thick plants covered in wet vines and sharp thorns seem to grow everywhere, and it is only due to some recent clearing that you can move through it. The clearance of the swamp vegetation does not seem fully coordinated and wanders around a fair bit in what appears to be a hasty attempt to get somewhere.

Room.Name: Before an immersed wooden walkway
Room.Description: Here deep in the Arkham swamps you have come across a hastily constructed wooden walkway. The wood is partially beneath the slopping swamp waters but it is clearly here to aid in the passage through the thick swamp to the east of here. To the north the vegetation has been poorly cleared in a hasty attempt to make a pathway through it.

Room.Name: On a wooden walkway
Room.Description: You are on a hastily constructed wooden walkway over the deep swamp waters. Many recent footprints lead east across the walkway and you can hear the faint sounds of people far off in the distance.

Room.Name: On a murky trail through the swamps
Room.Description: You are on a muddy path that seems to have been trampled down by the frequent comings and goings of some local creatures. Muddy water sloshes at your feet and mud slurps noisily as you walk. The pathway continues north and south.

Room.Name: On a murky trail through the swamps
Room.Description: You are on a muddy path that seems to have been trampled down by the frequent comings and goings of some local creatures. Muddy water sloshes at your feet and mud slurps noisily as you walk. The pathway continues south and west.

Room.Name: Before a dirty and mired gate in the swamps
Room.Description: You are standing in front of a badly built wooden gate surrounded by a decayed and collapsing fence. There is very little workmanship evident on the making of this meagre barricade. A muddy pathway leads east, or you can go west into the small region surrounded by the fence.

Room.Name: In a wet and smelly hut
Room.Description: This hut is mostly collapsed and it mired in water and swamp mud. It appears that whoever lived here has been evicted in a rather violent fashion. You can go north out of the hut.

Room.Name: On a murky little path through a village
Room.Description: You are on a muddy little path in a small village. The ruins of the village lie all around you and it is plain that something destroyed it in a hurry. There are some claw marks in the mud that appear quite recent.

Room.Name: Inside a collapsing wooden hut
Room.Description: This is one of the last remaining huts that even has a semblance of structure. It is now barely upright as the swamp waters lap at it's support and push it around.

Room.Name: Between two decrepit wooden huts
Room.Description: You are in a muddy village that has been destroyed in some recent event. Two huts still stand to the east and west of you.

Room.Name: Before a pair of burnt wooden huts
Room.Description: You are at the northern end of what was once a small village in the swamps. All that remains now are the burnt and collapsing ruins of small huts. One such hut lies to the north and another is in the east.

Room.Name: In a collapsing wooden hut
Room.Description: There is nothing in here but swamp water and a cold breeze. Whoever destroyed this village did a very good job.

Room.Name: Inside a burnt hut
Room.Description: Another burnt hut. One more small remaineder of what was once a little town here in the Arkham swamps.

Room.Name: In a burnt hut filled with bodies
Room.Description: This hut is in better condition than the rest in the ruins. A pile of bloated and disgusting bodies lie on the ground, left over from when the village was destroyed. An awful smell of death is all around you.

Room.Name: In a large burnt out wooden hut
Room.Description: Just a burnt shell of what appears to have been the main house of the village. It may even have been the village meeting hall, but now it is just a broken and water-logged pile of wood.

NPC.name: ogre
NPC.description: This thing is big and stupid. All it really understands is hunger, and you look like a viable meal.
NPC.longDescription: A large swamp ogre wades towards you through the murky water.

NPC.name: lizardman lizard man
NPC.longDescription: A tall green lizardman hisses at you with a long pointed tongue.

NPC.name: water snake
NPC.longDescription: A large slick snake slithers across the muddy ground.

NPC.name: giant leech
NPC.longDescription: A massive leech floats across the muddy waters and attaches itself to you!

Item.Name: corpses bodies
Item.LongDescription: A pile of bodies lie floating in the muddy water.

ExtraDescription.Description: Looks like the villagers who once lived here didn't all escape when whoever attacked them came by.
